questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: The key to happiness is getting what you want.
Never give up on your dream.
Use your resources to be successful.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Learning how to play chess is difficult.
It's important to be a good sport.
Life is what you make of it.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Raking is better than mopping or sweeping.
Listen to your elders for their wisdom.
Doing old things in a new way can be better.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Friends make trips more fun.
Woody's idea of creating their own Hawaiian trip was great!
True friends can help make our dreams come true.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: New is better than old.
Be happy with what you have.
Having new things helps us appreciate them.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Embrace the differences in others.
Birds make good pets.
Don't be afraid of bullies.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Our destiny will always be fulfilled.
Love is inevitable.
Paper airplanes are good matchmakers.

questions.question: Which of the following statements would be the most appropriate THEME of the video?

choices.answer: Stay on your guard or you may get eaten.
Don't help others--it's a waste of time.
Sometimes our efforts don't make a difference.
